sense.def:
A trap
je naprava ali luknja, v katero želimo ujeti ptice ali druge živali.

A trap
je tudi zvijača, s katero želimo nekoga ujeti ali prevarati.

seg.quote: I knew perfectly well it was a trap.

sense.def:
To trap animals
pomeni ujeti živali tako, da jim nastavimo past.

To trap someone
pomeni nekoga z zvijačo pripraviti do tega, da naredi ali reče nekaj, česar ni hotel narediti ali reči.

seg.quote: This wasn't the first time we had been trapped into a situation like this.

sense.def:
To be trapped in an unpleasant place or situation
pomeni, da se znajdemo na neprijetnem kraju ali v neprijetnem položaju, iz katerega ne moremo uiti.

seg.quote: I can't get up, I'm trapped here.
Many women are trapped in loveless marriages.

sense.def:
A trap
je tudi neprijeten položaj, iz katerega se ne moremo zlahka rešiti.

seg.quote: To break out of the poverty trap they need help from the government.
